医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
英国生物工业协会表示，工党可以通过预算中针对行业的税收政策来促进增长并减少浪费https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/Labour-can-boost-growth-and-cut-waste-with-sector-targeted-tax-policy-in-Budget-says-UK-BioIndustry-关联.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/Labour-can-boost-growth-and-cut-waste-with-sector-targeted-tax-policy-in-Budget-says-UK-BioIndustry- Association.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b30d2dab-46ee-4dcb-972b-1a4173aa6219 Tue, 03 Sep 2024 02:54:00 -0400 Labour can boost growth and cut waste with sector-targeted tax policy in Budget, says UK BioIndustry Association
啤酒和苹果酒会显着增加男女痛风风险，但男性受影响更大研究发现，增加某些酒精饮料的消费，尤其是啤酒和烈酒，与男性患痛风的风险较高有关，而女性则根据酒精类型和频率的不同，表现出不同的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/Beer-and-cider-significantly-raise-gout-risk-for-both-sexes-but-men-are-more-affected.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240903/Beer-and-cider-significantly-raise-gout-risk-for-both-sexes-but-men-are-more-affected.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d25c43cf-6f86-424a-91da-ab05a4c8f471 Tue, 03 Sep 2024 00:17:00 -0400 Beer and cider significantly raise gout risk for both sexes, but men are more affected
科学家揭示微生物小蛋白质的全球目录，解开微生物组的秘密研究人员开发了微生物基因组中近十亿个小型开放阅读框（smORF）的全球目录，揭示了显着的蛋白质多样性，特别是古细菌中的蛋白质多样性，并为微生物组研究提供了新工具。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/Scientists-reveal-global-catalog-of-microbial-small- Proteins-unlocking-microbiome-secrets.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/Scientists-reveal-global-catalog-of-microbial-small- Proteins-unlocking-microbiome-secrets.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=82cdbb2b-46d7-426a-b526-f7d9e9f70644 Mon, 02 Sep 2024 23:38:00 -0400 Scientists reveal global catalog of microbial small proteins, unlocking microbiome secrets
植物性脂肪在降低心脏病和糖尿病风险方面优于乳制品脂肪最近的一项研究证实，用植物性不饱和脂肪替代乳制品中的饱和脂肪可以显着降低心脏代谢风险。研究结果需要在不同人群中进行进一步验证。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/Plant-based-fats-outperform-dairy-fats-in-reducing-heart-disease-and-diabetes-risks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/Plant-based-fats-outperform-dairy-fats-in-reducing-heart-disease-and-diabetes-risks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=abd94c6d-c364-4139-97aa-d4ce17751f28 Mon, 02 Sep 2024 23:02:00 -0400 Plant-based fats outperform dairy fats in reducing heart disease and diabetes risks
MYO1D 突变被确定为精子缺陷和先天性疾病的关键因素该研究发现了 MYO1D 基因中的一种新变异，该变异与人类偏侧性缺陷、先天性心脏病和精子缺陷有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/MYO1D-mutation-identified-as-a-key-factor-in-sperm-defects-and-congenital-conditions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/MYO1D-mutation-identified-as-a-key-factor-in-sperm-defects-and-congenital-conditions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a24c8c18-74d5-42af-a5d0-3fd41541fafc Mon, 02 Sep 2024 22:56:00 -0400 MYO1D mutation identified as a key factor in sperm defects and congenital conditions
新的研究计划旨在使澳大利亚处于量子生物技术的前沿昆士兰大学发起了一项耗资 4500 万美元的研究计划，旨在将澳大利亚定位为量子生物技术的全球领导者，并应对世界上一些最大的挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/New-research-initiative-aims-to-position-Australia-at-the-forefront-of-quantum-biotechnology.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/New-research-initiative-aims-to-position-Australia-at-the-forefront-of-quantum-biotechnology.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=40fb3339-dba2-4f1a-a8a3-148a48992e34 Mon, 02 Sep 2024 22:46:00 -0400 New research initiative aims to position Australia at the forefront of quantum biotechnology
资金增加加速了有前景的类风湿性关节炎治疗方法的开发昆士兰大学领导的团队获得了 1150 万美元的资助，对于患有使人衰弱的自身免疫性疾病类风湿性关节炎 (RA) 的患者来说，长期缓解是可以实现的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/Funding-boost-accelerates-development-of-promising-rheumatoid-arthritis-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/Funding-boost-accelerates-development-of-promising-rheumatoid-arthritis-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5e822262-2671-4963-9d8d-376d5cc3978f Mon, 02 Sep 2024 22:43:00 -0400 Funding boost accelerates development of promising rheumatoid arthritis treatment
全国调查显示年轻人多动症治疗方面存在差距埃克塞特大学研究的一部分进行的一项全国调查发现，多动症的治疗存在巨大差异，凸显了许多年轻人一旦年满 18 岁就会面临的困境。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/National-survey-reveals-gaps-in-ADHD-treatment-for-young-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/National-survey-reveals-gaps-in-ADHD-treatment-for-young-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=99e52aa1-35c6-4fa8-a0d6-417dda755a3f Mon, 02 Sep 2024 22:40:00 -0400 National survey reveals gaps in ADHD treatment for young adults
联合国儿童基金会紧急招标采购mpox疫苗联合国儿童基金会今天宣布，已针对采购麻疹疫苗发出紧急招标。疫苗可以在遏制 MPOX 疫情方面发挥关键作用，非洲疾病控制和预防中心 (Africa CDC) 和世界卫生组织 (WHO) 均宣布该疫情为突发公共卫生事件。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/UNICEF-issues-emergency-tender-for-mpox-vaccine-procurement.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/UNICEF-issues-emergency-tender-for-mpox-vaccine-procurement.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4efcec9f-e71f-4fb5-955f-34fdf1c05b32 Mon, 02 Sep 2024 22:31:22 -0400 UNICEF issues emergency tender for mpox vaccine procurement
在常见牙菌斑细菌中发现非凡的细胞分裂机制地球上最多样化的生态系统之一比您想象的更近 -；就在你的嘴里。您的口腔是一个欣欣向荣的生态系统，由 500 多种不同种类的细菌组成，这些细菌生活在独特的结构化群落（称为生物膜）中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/Extraordinary-cell-division-mechanism-discovered-in-common-dental-plaque-bacteria.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/Extraordinary-cell-division-mechanism-discovered-in-common-dental-plaque-bacteria.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3dcb0a75-953d-4a25-9ccc-2d021cf5028c Mon, 02 Sep 2024 22:27:03 -0400 Extraordinary cell division mechanism discovered in common dental plaque bacteria
